name: NEScape!
description: NEScape! is an "escape the room" 1st person point and click graphic adventure game, inspired by real-life "escape rooms". You have 60 minutes to solve the puzzles and escape.

shot.caption: When starting the game, you can either press the Start button on the controller, or solve this simple introductory puzzle.
The first room (after turning on the lights) has some useful objects in it.
The first box has been unlocked. Yet more useful items!
Another room. Is the picture of kid important or just decorative? What about the statue, the phone and the typewrite? Maybe all of them are, or perhaps none of them.
No puzzle game is complete without a sliding block puzzle.
